alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Holmes; Jackson; North Walton; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 3:39PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Jackson, central Walton, Holmes and Washington Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 239 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Marianna to 9 miles northeast of Santa Rosa Beach. Movement was northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Chipley, Graceville, De Funiak Springs, Bonifay, Marianna, Eglin Air Force Base, Bradford, Union, Live Oak, Freeport, Cottondale, Ponce De Leon, Alford, Caryville, Wausau, Westville, Ebro, Campbellton and Oakwood Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Holmes; Jackson; North Walton; South Walton; Washington
